Habitat: Dense tropical rainforests of Tanzania, rich with towering canopies.
Thick, swampy marshlands near the Zambezi River.
Remote mountainous woodlands with heavy mist and limited visibility.
Agogwe.Description: A small, elusive humanoid covered in coarse hair. The Agogwe is known to move swiftly through the dense forests, rarely seen by human eyes. Locals speak of its ability to blend into the surroundings and disappear in the blink of an eye.

Hearts.Name: Forest Camouflage
Hearts.Effect: The Agogwe blends into the surroundings, healing 5 HP and avoiding damage for one turn.

Spades.Name: Venomous Swipe
Spades.Effect: A swift strike poisons the enemy, dealing 3 damage each turn for 3 turns.

Diamonds.Name: Jungle Ambush
Diamonds.Effect: Lurking from the shadows, the Agogwe attacks, dealing double damage on its next strike.

Clubs.Name: Branch Snare
Clubs.Effect: Entangles the opponent with vines, stunning them for 1 turn.

CardNumbers.2-10: Power of the attacks scales with card number.

Jack.Effect: Agogwe strikes three times rapidly, dealing moderate damage.

Queen.Name: Nature's Vengeance
Queen.Effect: Summons the forces of the forest to deal AoE damage to all enemies.

King.Name: Lord of the Wilds
King.Effect: Gains a permanent attack buff for the rest of the battle.

Spades.Effect: Throws sharp splinters at the enemy, causing bleeding (damage over time).

Clubs.Name: Knockback Smash

CardNumbers.2-10: Damage and number of splinters increase with card number.

Habitat: Snow-capped peaks of the Swiss-French Alps, in the narrow crevices of glacial ice.

Ukumarzapai.Description: Ukumarzapai is a cryptid from the dense jungle mountains of South America. It is believed to be highly elusive, with very few documented encounters. Locals say it emits strange sounds at night, hinting at its presence in the otherwise quiet jungle.

Vedi.Description: The Vedi are massive humanoid creatures said to be as tall as peasant houses. Covered in thick hair, they possess enormous strength, able to uproot trees and carry heavy loads with ease. Their deep voices can be heard from great distances, and they are believed to cause storms with a single breath.

Yeti.Description: The Yeti, also known as the 'Abominable Snowman,' is a massive cryptid that inhabits the cold, snowy regions of the Himalayas. Known for its white fur and imposing size, the Yeti has been reported by mountaineers for centuries. It is often described as a shy, reclusive creature that avoids human contact.

Yowie.Description: The Yowie is one of Australia's most dangerous cryptids. Ranging from 6 to 12 feet tall, it has long arms and fangs, with reddish fur. Known for its violent nature, the Yowie has been reported tearing apart kangaroos and dogs with its powerful claws. It is deeply rooted in Aboriginal folklore and is said to be a part of the Dreamtime stories.
